StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNwaPending3]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Star.ngRow int, @PageSize int, @OrgID int, @SortBy int
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @_Star.ngRow int DECLARE @_PageSize int DECLARE @_OrgID int DECLARE @_SortBy int
SET @_Star.ngRow = @Star.ngRow SET @_PageSize = @PageSize SET @_OrgID = @OrgID SET @_SortBy = @SortBy
DECLARE @LastRow int SET @LastRow = @_Star.ngRow + @_PageSize
CREATE TABLE #NWASortedTable( [RowNumber] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Person_ID] [int] NOT NULL, [NWA_ID] [int] NOT NULL, [ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID] [int] NULL, [SSN] [varchar](9) NULL, [FIRST_NAME] [varchar](20) NULL, [MIDDLE_NAME] [varchar](20) NULL, [LAST_NAME] [varchar](20) NULL, [Su.x] [varchar](5) NULL, [DECL] [date.me] NOT NULL, [DSW] [date.me] NULL, [AGE] [int] NULL, [GENDER_CODE] [char](1) NULL, [CATEGORY_CODE] [varchar](6) NULL, [RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID] [int] NULL, [DISPOSITION_CODE] [varchar](20) NOT NULL, [RSS] [varchar](45) NULL, [RECRUITER_NAME] [varchar](50) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_NWASortedTable] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [RowNumber] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
INSERT INTO #NWASortedTable SELECT P.Person_ID, N.NWA_ID, N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER as SSN, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as MIDDLE_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.SUFFIX_CD as Su.x, N.NWA_DECLARED_DATE as DECL, N.NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING as DSW, USMC.GetAge(MC.DATE_OF_BIRTH) as AGE, MC.GENDER_CODE, N.CATEGORY_CODE, N.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID, CS.DISPOSITION_CODE, RSS.NAME as RSS, LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + ' ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P2.LAST_NAME)) AS RECRUITER_NAME FROM dbo.PERSON P INNER JOIN vwCurrentNWA N on P.Person_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [USMC].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] VWROI ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = VWROI.root INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RSS ON VWROI.RSS = RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(CS2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS2 WHERE CS2.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID) INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC on P.Person_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_PERSON RP ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = N.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P2 ON P2.PERSON_ID = RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID WHERE (VWROI.RS = @_OrgID OR VWROI.RSS = @_OrgID OR VWROI.District = @_OrgID OR VWROI.Region = @_OrgID OR VWROI.HQ = @_OrgID) AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'PA' ORDER BY CASE @_SortBy WHEN 1 THEN 7 WHEN 2 THEN 4 WHEN 3 THEN 10 WHEN 4 THEN 11 WHEN 5 THEN 12 WHEN 6 THEN 16 WHEN 7 THEN 17 ELSE 7 END ,CASE WHEN @_SortBy = 1 THEN 5 END ,CASE WHEN @_SortBy = 1 THEN 6 END
SELECT * FROM #NWASortedTable WHERE RowNumber >= @_Star.ngRow AND RowNumber <= @LastRow
DROP TABLE #NWASortedTable
END
